metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19926 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: multiSelect in select.c in SQLite 3.30.1 mishandles certain errors during parsing, as demonstrated by errors from sqlite3WindowRewrite() calls. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-19880.

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-1ubuntu1').
